title: AMD Ryzen 6000 Series: Release date, price, and everything you need to know
content:
After a successful run with the 5000 series CPUs, AMD kickstarted its 2022 product launches with a new generation of chips for the notebook market. AMD marked the beginning of a busy and important year with its new Ryzen 6000 series mobile processors. These “Rembrandt” APUs feature up to eight powerful Zen3+ cores and its

The post AMD Ryzen 6000 Series: Release date, price, and everything you need to know appeared first on xda-developers.
description: AMD Ryzen 6000 series is now official. In this article, we'll tell you everything to know about AMD's new mobile processors.
